issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
The [DB|http://developer.appcelerator.com/apidoc/mobile/latest/Titanium.Database.DB-object] remove() method exists in Android (see [source|https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/blob/master/android/modules/database/src/java/ti/modules/titanium/database/TiDatabaseProxy.java#L182]) but not in iOS.

This ticket requests parity.

comments.body: Resolving as it is duplicate of TIMOB-26786.
